Welcome to Made In Bharat Websites- Privacy Policy

PLEASE PROCEED ONLY IF YOU AGREE TO BELOW MENTIONED IMPORTANT POINTS

DOMAIN IS FREE FOR THE FIRST YEAR TILL RS. 600 ONLY. If any domain cost more than Rs. 600, client is required to bear the cost for the same.

CURRENTLY WE PROVIDE FREE HOSTING FOR ONLY STATIC WEBSITES.
DYNAMIC WEBSITES WHICH INVOLVES DATABASE OR BACK END WORK ARE NOT INCLUDED AT ALL.

Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms which are beyond our control. Please be sure to check the Privacy Policies of these sites as well as their “Terms of Service” before engaging in any business or uploading any information.

All contracts will be mutually decided. Contracts or clients which will receive direct message or email from madeinbharatwebsites.com are only to be considered valid. All others contracts will be void and not enforceable in any court of law.And no deemed contract will be considered valid.

CONSENT: By using our website, you hereby consent to our PRIVACY POLICY and TERMS OF SERVICE.
